p:
The epitaxial GMO thin film has an overall unit cell volume constrain of ~0.7%, in comparison to the respective cell parameters of the bulk GMO ( a o = 5.318 Å, b o = 7.431 Å and c o = 5.866 Å)
21, 24 . Moreover, the cell parameters of the tetragonal film phase undergo a remarkable alteration analog to an expansion of ~2.8% in b and ~6.4% in a, while c contracts ~3.2%. Such significant values should be considered beyond a mere distortion of the orthorhombic phase.
